summary: Completed testing of NPA Tracker and SNA Tracker features. All backend API tests pass (9/9). Frontend UI tests verified tabs display correctly, Add Agent modal shows both 'Select Team Member' and 'Manual Entry' modes, and team member selection with automatic premium calculation from activities works correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up test NPA agent 'TEST_Manual_Agent' during backend tests. Added and removed 'John Regional' during frontend integration test.
context_for_next_testing_agent: NPA and SNA Tracker features are fully functional. NPA Tracker allows adding agents via team member dropdown (premium auto-calculated from activities) or manual entry. SNA Tracker automatically tracks new agents from first production toward $30,000 goal in 90 days. All tabs (Reports, New Faces, SNA, NPA) display correctly without overflow.

npa_tracker.add_agent_modal_modes: PASS - Both 'Select Team Member' and 'Manual Entry' modes work correctly
npa_tracker.team_member_dropdown: PASS - Shows 49 team members, selection populates form fields
npa_tracker.premium_from_activities: PASS - When user_id is present, premium is calculated from activities collection (John Regional showed $1,000 from activities)
npa_tracker.manual_entry: PASS - Agent Name field appears in manual mode
npa_tracker.crud_operations: PASS - Add, update, delete all work correctly
npa_tracker.tabs_display: PASS - 'In Progress' and 'Achieved NPA' tabs work correctly

sna_tracker.summary_cards: PASS - Shows Active Tracking, On Pace, Behind Pace, Completed Goal, Total Premium
sna_tracker.empty_state: PASS - Shows appropriate message when no agents in 90-day period

reports_tabs.tab_styling: PASS - All tabs (Reports, New Faces, SNA, NPA) display correctly without overflow
reports_tabs.color_coded_active_states: PASS - Active tabs show appropriate colors (blue for Reports, green for SNA, amber for NPA)
